overview: A Chinese cinematographer Kai is invited to join a project in Edinburgh, but the pandemic arrives, and he lost contact with his production teams. He decides to stay because he is fascinated by the look of the city. He follows the script from the director and starts to film around the city. Later, he feels that he's been followed by somebody, he tries to escape and then accidentally spot the director on the street.
title: The Curtain will Rise Again
